extendedInfo.description: Joomla Admin Mobile! Lite (JAM! Lite) allows you to blog and edit many of the core features from your Joomla! 1.5, 1.6, 1.7 and 2.5 sites right from your Android device, for free! Have someone spamming your forums? Block them with the flip of a switch. Did a user email you that they forgot their password? Change it for them and send them an email to let them know. All without leaving the app! Think you have no reason to 'administer' while on the go? JAM is also the perfect blogging app! Create new articles, set the title and category, and even upload images (coming soon to Android version) from your phone. It couldn't be easier. Please note: JAM! Lite is a limited version of the full JAM! application. In addition to being ad-supported, it only allows for full blogging features. It is limited to only viewing most other admin features (See chart below). The full allows you to edit and save everything you see in the app. The Lite version is also limited to accessing one plugin.JAM! Lite Feature List:     * Save your Joomla! site login information     * View/Add/Edit/Delete Joomla Articles w/ images (images coming soon to Android)    * View Joomla Sections (Joomla! 1.5 only)    * View Joomla Categories     * View Joomla Users     * View Joomla Menus     * View Joomla Menu Items     * Pagination for all groups - You select how many articles, users, etc you fetch at a time     * Article filtering by section, category, or publishing status     * Edit/Insert Images into Articles (coming soon to Android)    * View/Edit Global Configuration    * 3rd Party Plugins (limited in Lite version)    * 3rd Party Plugins allow you to use plugins to access any data on your site (including custom tables and files)If you're looking to add or edit more of the above items, take a look at our full version. All this is made possible with a Joomla! 1.5/1.6/1.7/2.5 xml/rpc component installed on each site. A Getting Started Guide can be found here: http://www.covertapps.com/get-started-with-j-admin-mobile The Joomla component is available below: http://www.covertapps.com/jam Feature planning and request forum: http://jadminmobile.uservoice.com/ Support Forum: http://www.covertapps.com/forum/forum?id=45

reviews.title: Just guide demo
reviews.comment: 10$ is alot for an app and un the demo its just the gui.  No actual demo of function. Worthless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: many
reviews.comment: this is crap,  I don\'t edit noting with free version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t add pics to articles
reviews.comment: This is a great app, but a real deal breaker for me is not being able to add pictures to articles. Otherwise it\'s generally stable and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Images
reviews.comment: STILL NO IMAGE support: Add support to upload images my cell & allow me to easily specify width/height and my 3 turns into a 5!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Excellent app! Just what I was looking for!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Simple to use, but extremely powerful for administrating your Joomla site. Highly recommend!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: So very glad to finally be able to download the Android app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app!  Very user-friendly and simple to use.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved it on my iPod and been waiting for the Android one. Thanks for delivering!
reviews.author: A Google User
